column6: "IMAGINE PEACE" Who sent Crossbones to kill Bucky Barnes? Who benefits from erasing their steps the most? There is a planet that is a gun and that gun is now aimed at Mer-z-Bow. Two hundred years in the future, Bucky Barnes helped establish peace. Now you will find out how.
column8: | penciller (cover):Mike Del Mundo | artist:Langdon Foss | artist:Marco Rudy | writer:Ales Kot
